backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister defining an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including screens, effects, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color vars, light/dark themes, and global body styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root element and main React script with preconnects for Google Fonts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling screen flow, button behaviors, animations, and visual effects.
frontend/src/components/effects/Confetti: Canvas-based animated confetti renderer with falling pastel particles.
frontend/src/components/effects/Firework: Canvas component generating randomized fireworks rockets and particle explosions.
frontend/src/components/WarningGate.tsx: Warning screen component showing a caution message, shareable link, copy action, and continue button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/hooks/useShareLink.ts: Defines a hook that generates a shareable URL with a warning fragment and provides clipboard copy functionality with status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining fonts, colors, animations, and utility classes for the appâ€™s pastel-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to implementing a warning screen and shareable link behavior.
